description:
I am getting following error while spinning CSR using ansible script.

2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-8e50439a-6a54-4db9-a64a-920a57118021 ba6bd81724d34b538712feb1aac3d6b6 74259d490b2b478daadc91478c73a050 - - -] HTTP exception thrown: Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'>

in nova-api.log i got the following information.

2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'prompt'
2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions

Please let me know how to resolve this issue.
title: ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'prompt'

comments.content:
I am getting following error while spinning CSR using ansible script.

2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-8e50439a-6a54-4db9-a64a-920a57118021 ba6bd81724d34b538712feb1aac3d6b6 74259d490b2b478daadc91478c73a050 - - -] HTTP exception thrown: Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'>

in nova-api.log i got the following information.

2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'prompt'
2017-05-19 02:38:26.803 8088 ERROR nova.api.openstack.extensions

Please let me know how to resolve this issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~openstackrk

comments.content: What is CSR? Which release of nova is this? Is there more to the error like a stacktrace because I don't see anything about "prompt" in the code. Do you have API extensions that aren't in the upstream git repo?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
